snippet: A 51-year-old who teed off in the third round of the Masters, Jeff Knox, shot a 70 before the huge galleries attracted by McIlroy, his playing partner.
abstract: On Par blog; Jeff Knox, who played as the marker for the two-time major champion Rory McIlroy, shoots a 70 in third round of Masters to beat McIlroy, whose scorecard he was keeping, by one stroke; other golf news noted.

byline.original: By KAREN CROUSE and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: A 51-year-old who teed off in the third round of the Masters, Jeff Knox, shot a 70 before the huge galleries attracted by McIlroy, his playing partner.

headline.main: Augusta’s Designated Fill-In Bests Rory McIlroy
